rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0001
rows.name:
Now, hurry up and go
see Chairman Bahn, mo!

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0005
rows.name:
Chairman Bahn's office is
through the shopping district
and up the stairs, mo.

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't stand around loitering!
You're young, so run along, mo!

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0007
rows.name:
So-so, I suppose, mo— My wife
left me, but other than that,
nothing's really changed, mo.

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0011
rows.name:
Rex— Do your best to meet
the expectations of Chairman
Bahn and Punin, mo.

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0012
rows.name:
Punin-san, thank you for
recommending me. I'll do my best!

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0013
rows.name:
Still, a reward worth 100
months of Punin's salary...
I'm incredibly jealous, mo—

rows.label: tlk0001013_msg0014
rows.name:
(If I succeed, I'll treat
him to about 10 Samod—)
